name: Explorer：Golden Empire
description:
This is the story that takes place in a magical world called Soresa, where a group of young people form an adventurer team from their hometown to explore their background, explore the world, and ultimately find the legendary Golden Empire.
There is no concept of hierarchy in the game. Players gradually travel to every corner of the world according to the plot, while also providing an open world gameplay. Forging, tailoring, gemstone processing, and so on all require players to explore and search for various materials in the game, ultimately casting the most powerful weapons and equipment. In addition, in the game, players can collect all the ingredients by fishing, harvesting meat, and collecting, Finally, cook food that permanently enhances one's own abilities.
Exploration teams can recruit new partners to join at any time in the game. Some are good at attacking, some are good at magic, some are good at healing, and some are good at defense. Each member has their own unique profession and skills. During battles, members can be arranged according to different battle scenes and opponents.
Welcome to the world of Soresa, everything here is waiting for you to explore!
